snippet: Iran announced Saturday that women would be allowed to attend big sporting events, reversing a rule that had barred them from entering stadiums to watch matches attended by men.
abstract: Iran will allow women to attend big sporting events, reversing highly-criticized rule that barred them from entering stadiums to watch matches attended by men.
lead_paragraph: Iran announced Saturday that women would be allowed to attend big sporting events, reversing a rule that had barred them from entering stadiums to watch matches attended by men.

headline.main: Iran Will Allow Women in Sports Stadiums, Reversing a Much-Criticized Rule
headline.print_headline: Iran to Allow Women in Sports Stadiums, Lifting Ban That Stirred Boycott Threats
